Yuning Qiu

yuning.qiu.gd@gmail.com

My name is Yuning Qiu, a PhD student in the School of Automation at Guangdong University of Technology. I am currently work with Prof. Guoxu Zhou, and my current research interests are tensor decomposition, unsupervised clustering and deep learning.

Education & Experience

  • 2012.9 - 2016.7   Bachelor in Department of Engineering   South China Agricultural University
  • 2016.10 - 2017.1   Student Intern   LABSP, RIKEN Brain Science Instutute, Japan
  • 2016.9 - now   PhD in Department of Automation   Guangdong University of Technology

Publications

Yuning Qiu, Guoxu Zhou, Yu Zhang, Shengli Xie
(Accepted to ICASSP 2019)

Orthogonal Random Projection Based Tensor Completion for Image Recovery
Yali Feng, Guoxu Zhou, Yuning Qiu, Weijun Sun
APSIPA Annual Summit and Conference, 2018

Comparative study on the classification methods for breast cancer diagnosis
Yuning Qiu, Guoxu Zhou, Qibin Zhao, Andrzej Cichocki
Bulletin of the Polish Academy of Sciences. Technical Sciences, 2018

Deep Approximately Orthogonal Nonnegative Matrix Factorization for Clustering
Yuning Qiu, Guoxu Zhou, Kan Xie
arXiv, 2017

jinshi.yu@foxmail.com

Github

I’m Jinshi Yu and is currently pursuing the ph.D degree with the Faculty of Automation, Guangdong University of Technology, Guangzhou, China. My research interests include nonnegative matrix factorization (NMF), tensor decomposition, tensor completion and machine learning. I am currently working with Prof. Guoxu Zhou, and if you are interested in our work, welcome to join in our lab.

Education & Experience

  • 2009.9 - 2013.6   Bachelor in Department of Automation   Zhongkai University of Agriculture and Engineering
  • 2015.10 - 2016.1   Student Intern   LABSP, RIKEN Brain Science Instutute, Japan
  • 2018.7 - 2019.1   Student Trainee   TLU, RIKEN Center for Advanced Intelligence Project, Japan
  • 2017.9 - now   PhD in Department of Automation   Guangdong University of Technology
